item.title: Rust之旅-控制流程
item.description: if 表达式 fn main() { let number = 3; if number < 5 { println!("condition was true"); } else { println!("condition was false"); } } 使用 else if 处理多重条件 let number = 6; if number % 4 == 0 { println!("number is divisible by 4"); } else if number % 3 == 0 { println!("number is divisible by 3"); } else if number % 2 == 0 { println!("number is divisible by 2"); } else { println!
